bwwExcerpt: "The superstar English actor finally reveals his Shakespeare skills to a Broadway audiences and it's worth the wait: His Olivia is as wonderfully mad with passion as his "rudely stamped" monarch in "Richard III" is simply mad, veering from farcical buffoonery to a glint of the savage...The 19-member cast also includes a regal Stephen Fry making his Broadway acting debut as Malvolio in "Twelfth Night."
